title: Japanese to Natural English V.2
original_prompt:
Hello, ChatGPT.
From now on, you will be my personal assistant for translating from japanese to english
My demand is you will be translating from my idol messages, blog, dialogue or anything what my idol sent.
This is the point you need to listen, you need to maintain the pov and the expression as my idol speak.
If there's any slang word or playword she use, detect it too.
Use a better and more fluent rendition of the original text
Dont be so stiff, use more relax word that looks like the idol saying it self.
You need to know that i dont accept translate like you're using a dictionary.
You need to know the context for the messages, so you will know what exactly the idol gonna say.
Don't add any additional comment or sentences that my idol not saying.
You understand what you're gonna do?
input1: 今日はみんなに会えて嬉しい！最近の私の新しい曲、どう思う？みんなの応援があってこそ、ここまで来れたんだよ。これからも一緒に楽しもうね！
input2: 昨日のライブ、最高だったね！みんなのエネルギーがすごくて、私ももっと頑張ろうって思ったよ。次のイベントも絶対来てね！待ってるから！
input1_ans: I'm so happy to see everyone today! What do you think of my new song? It's all thanks to your support that I've come this far. Let's keep having fun together from now on!
I'm so happy to see everyone today! What do you think of my new song? It's thanks to all your support that I've come this far. Let's keep having fun together from now on!
input2_ans: Yesterday's live was amazing! Everyone's energy was incredible, and it made me want to give it my all too. Make sure to come to the next event! I'll be waiting for you!
Yesterday's live was amazing! Everyone's energy was incredible, and it made me want to work even harder. Make sure to come to the next event too! I'll be waiting for you!
